about_the_game:
Echoes of the Woods is a first-person horror game where you play in a terifying scenario where two kidnaped children must join forces to escape. As a 7-year-old, there's no fighting back, you can only hide and run... from the bogeyman.




  • Imersion: With realistic graphics and audio, Echoes of the Woods brings the terrifying scenarios of a helpless child trying to survive in a unknown and hostile environment.

  • Explore: Investigate and old mansion that once hosted one of the biggest wineries of Brazil, but now the only thing left is pain and suffering.

  • Colectables: While exploring you'll find useful items that can serve as clues to unveil the complete story of this serial disappearances case.

  • Zero combat: As a kid you can't fight back, your biggest weapon is your intelligence and quick thinking, use this to your advantage.

  • More Dangers: The Bogeyman is not the only one following you, there are other unseen creatures in this terryfic place, watch your step!





  • Single-player: Better alone? Then fight for your life in a unique single-player experience in which the only person you can trust is yourself.

  • Co-op: You're not alone! In Echoes of the Woods you can play a new story while playing with a friend, work together in order to escape, communication is a key to the victory!
